content.text: Match ends, Valencia 2, Mallorca 0.
Second Half ends, Valencia 2, Mallorca 0.
Daniel Parejo (Valencia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Martí (Mallorca).
Corner,  Mallorca. Conceded by Ricardo Costa.
Attempt saved. Tomás Pina (Mallorca) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Víctor Casadesús.
Attempt missed. Tomer Hemed (Mallorca) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Nunes with a headed pass.
